name: Chess-Chomp
description:
One part 80's arcade game, one part chess, welcome to Chess-Chomp.  In Chess-Chomp, you, the super computer, must traverse the chess board before the chess pieces capture you.  Beware...they act like chess pieces.  Those knights can jump!

Check out all the levels.....if you can!

Graphics by Goseid.

Music and Level Layout by FlyingSpider.

The heavy lifting by SonOfSofaman.

Enjoy!
